long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use the Cradle Click-to-Call extension to call any phone number you see on a website. Cradle's Click-to-Call extension will ad a small phone icon to each phone number on a webpage making it as easy as clicking one button to call anyone through Cradle.
